Title: The Better Part of Valorstones
Description:
Dornogal! A fascinating new place to everyone--not just the dracthyr!

And fascinating new places have fascinating new reagents to find and study. Like Valorstones!

I've seen similar objects all over Azeroth used to upgrade weapons and armor. I hypothesize these will work the same way.

Help my research by bringing me any Valorstones you collect. I'll upgrade a piece of your gear in return!
ObjectivesText: Collect 50 Valorstones while adventuring in Khaz Algar, then return to Cuzolth and upgrade a piece of Season 1 equipment.
CompletionText: There's no need to hurry. But if you wouldn't mind hurrying anyway...
RewardText: My friend! You are truly a supportive breeze in flight. Please take these tokens of thanks.

Objectives.Text: Upgrade a piece of equipment with Valorstones
